	charset="iso-8859-1"

::Decadel::

        Decadel was sick and tired of sitting deep under the E=
arth's surface doing absolutely NOTHING!!!  He pounded his fist on the arm =
of his chair.

        "Now, I will go further in my quest to dominate this=
 planet and any transformers on it!!" He then went up to Hell Drak's cell.
=

          "And you, my pretty, will be just the one to help me do that....=
..HAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!" Decadel went away for a moment, and came back with a l=
ittle worm device.  He laughed maniacally, and then threw the worm thing at=
 Hell Drak.  The worm squirmed around her, and then went inside of her.  De=
cadel grinned fiendishly, and then took Hell Drak to a CR.  He waited for a=
 while, and then, she stepped out, fully healed.

        "Ah, I feel much,=
 much better......I feel, stronger!!" She said.

       Decadel jumped out =
in front of her.

         "Now, Hell Drak, you will serve me at all costs,=
 under all circumstances!!!  You will obey me when I command you to do some=
thing.  Got it??" He shouted, after figuring out her name.

        Hell Dr=
ak stepped back, and looked shocked, but then, the worm kicked in, and then=
, her eyes went a deep red for a moment.

        "Yes, master!!!" She said=
, and laughed evilly.

         "Now, come on beautiful, we have friends an=
d enemies to kill and take over!!!" He said.

         Decadel came out of =
the ground, and Hell Drak came up with him.  

        Hell Drak transforme=
d into dragon mode, and Decadel hopped on her back.

          "Straight ah=
ead!!!!!!  We have some imbeciles to kill, except for two bots who I would =
like to add to my collection!!!" He laughed out in evil, pointing ahead.

 =
       Hell Drak took off, towards KitKat and the others' location.
